EmailTemplate.subject: Are your applications talking to each other?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Join us on Wednesday, January 25th, for a lively discussion about how Azuqua and Pivotal make it easier to build applications that integrate with all of your cloud systems. During this webinar, you will learn how to unlock your diverse systems and develop new, customer-centric integrations.
Specifically, you will discover how to:
- Leverage microservices to build faster apps - Connect your app to existing data sources faster than ever before - Trigger workflows from apps running in Pivotal Cloud Foundry to other apps like Slack, Salesforce, Zendesk, Marketo, etc.
Webinar details below:
Date: Wednesday, January 25, 2017 Time: 10:00am PST / 1:00pm EST
Save My Seat <[[http://go.azuqua.com/How-to-rapidly-connect-PCF-apps-to-all-your-microservices-APIs-databases-and-cloud-apps.html]]>
Speakers: Richard Seroter, Senior Director of Product, Pivotal Skyler Hartle, Growth Manager and Resident Hacker, Azuqua
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
